title: How much does VIPkid pay per hour? - Quora
tags: Salaries for Specific Jobs and Careers

response.answer_text: VIPKID pays $18-$22 per hour. It’s set based on how much experience you have and how well you do in the interview process. If you’re an experienced teacher and you interview well, you’ll earn $9 per each 25 minute class. If you’re less experienced and interview okay, you’ll start with $7 per 25 minute class. Then, for each class completed successfully, you’ll earn $1 per class. For each class you fill out a review of what you taught the student, you’ll earn another $1. This equates to the total of $18-$22 per hour. After two successful contract periods (6 months), they will raise your pay. If you’re interested, you can apply here :)

Base pay is $14 - $18/hour. You get an attendance bonus (i.e. you showed up) of $2.00/hour on top of that. And, you can get an additional bonus of $1 - $2/hour depending on the number of classes you teach. So the range is actually $16 - $22/hour. Hope that helps.
